column1: ~ 03:00|"About three o'clock in the morning"|"She had stationed herself by the lift with a supply of Happy Tabbies
column2: one of Gleamhound's preparations. They looked very pretty
column4: and she put a bag of them in the lift. About three o'clock in the morning she had been woken by the sound of the lift descending
column5: and the door sliding open."|"Uncle and Claudius the Camel"|"J. P. Martin"
